title: Episode 81 - McCarthyism And The Major Trials Of The Period
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we examine two of the major trials of the period the Hiss hearings and trials and that of the Rosenbergs.

For pictures for this episode and more go to our website at: 
 www.historyofthecoldwarpodcast.com/
